description: Manifest file for attendance records - update this file when adding new attendance HTML files

instructions.addingNewFiles: To add new attendance files: 1) Add the HTML file to the repository, 2) Add an entry to the 'files' array above with filename, title, date, description, and category, 3) Update the 'lastUpdated' timestamp
instructions.namingConvention: Use format 'attendance-YYYY-MM-DD.html' for date-based files or 'attendance-session-XX.html' for session-based files
instructions.categories: Use existing categories or add new ones to the 'categories' object
